item.title: What's Really in the Bag?
item.author: yourname@example.com (yourname)
item.description: #vDM30in30 progress: Since I «launched» my In the Bag series of weekly links yesterday, I figured I should really show what is indeed in the bag.Â Lifehacker runs a series called Featured Bag and the voyeur in me finds it interesting what other people carry around, and how they organize it.
